attributes.action: Prevent the development of artificial general super intelligence
attributes.additional_details: Artificial General Super Intelligence poses an existential threat to humanity. We cannot align its objectives with ours, yet it could surpass human intelligence and embed itself in countless global systems. A single flawed implementation could destabilize health, finance, defense, and the economy. Once created, errors are irreversible. We are in a race to the bottom—Parliament should debate forming an international coalition to halt its development.
attributes.background: Start an international coalition to prevent the research and development of artificial general super intelligence.

rejection.details:
We are not clear what the specific action is that you are seeking, nor that it is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

You can start a petition setting out more clearly what action you are seeking.
